Docs.value: The URI of the resource, or if the resource is anonymous or a literal.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool op_Equality (SemWeb.Resource a, SemWeb.Resource b);

Docs.remarks: Two resources are equal if they are both entities and either 1) are the same object, 2) have the same URI, or 3) are anonymous entities created by the same Store and marked as representing the same entity; or if they are Literals, if they have the same value, language, and datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool op_Inequality (SemWeb.Resource a, SemWeb.Resource b);

Docs.summary: The base class of and -- the nodes in an RDF graph.

remarks.para: The and classes inherit from this class. This class cannot be inherited in user code.

The == and != operators have been overloaded for Resources. Two resources are equal if they are both objects and the overloaded == operator returns true, or if they are both objects with equal values for Value, Language, and DataType.
